law.history: Repealed 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 496, sec. 67, effective July 13, 1990. -- Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 221, sec. 2, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 40, sec. 1, effective March 12, 1980. -- Created 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 212, sec. 3, effective June 17, 1978.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Copies to be filed with legislative research commission -- Other documentation -- File open to public inspection -- Conditions for payment.
